traits.name: Amphibious
entries: Lowarnizel can breathe both air and water.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: Lowarnizel makes one Bite attack and two Claw attacks.

actions.name: Bite
entries: Melee atk +9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 16 (2d10 + 5 damage) piercing damage plus 4 (1d8 damage) force damage.

actions.name: Claw
entries: Melee atk +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 9 (1d8 + 5 damage) slashing damage.

actions.name: Singularity Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: Lowarnizel creates a shining bead of gravitational force, then releases the energy in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 17 Strength saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 36 (8d8 damage) force damage, and its speed becomes 0 until the start of the dragon's next turn. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage only.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting (Psionics)
headerEntries: Lowarnizel casts one of the following spells, requiring no spell components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 16}):
